Interface ICharacter

All Known Implementing Classes:
Character, Sheep, Wolf
public interface ICharacter
Interface representing a game character (e.g., Sheep or Wolf).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isAlive()
    Checks if the character is still alive.
    boolean
    isEnemy()
    Checks if the character is an enemy (e.g., a Wolf).
    void
    move(double tiles, boolean doesTimeFlow)
    Moves the character by a given number of tiles in its current direction.

  • Method Details

    • move

      void move(double tiles, boolean doesTimeFlow)
      Moves the character by a given number of tiles in its current direction.
      Parameters:
      tiles - Number of tiles to move.
      doesTimeFlow - Whether time is currently flowing (true for frame renderings + clock only moves with renders).

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive()
      Checks if the character is still alive.
      Returns:
      true if alive, false otherwise.

    • isEnemy

      boolean isEnemy()
      Checks if the character is an enemy (e.g., a Wolf).
      Returns:
      true if enemy, false otherwise.
